item.title: Re-naming the listener - check for dependencies
item.description: This is a fairly foolish pitfall that I stumbled into last week. One of the recommendations from our external security audit was that we rename the listener from the default ‘LISTENER’ to something else. I’m a little bit dubious as to how much renaming the listener increases ‘security’ since the listener name is visible in the Services panel or through net start. However, from a security POV it can’t do any harm, and it’s not a lot of effort, so we went ahead with it.
